pageProduct.name: Sukin Oil Balancing Shine Control Sheet Mask Sachet
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Restore Balance To Oily Skin With Bamboo Charcoal To Mattify And Hydrate.

Warnings

Avoid Contact With Eyes. Do Not Use On Broken Or Irritated Skin. If Irritation Occurs Rinse Immediately And Discontinue Use. We Recommend Patch Testing. For External Use Only.

Common Uses

Tame Your Troublesome T-Zone With Sukin’S Shine Control Sheet Mask, Featuring Bamboo Charcoal. It Helps Mattify Skin, Remove Excess Oil And Protect From Environmental Pollutants, Leaving Skin Balanced, Hydrated And Healthy. Our Sheet Mask Is Made With 100% Natural Cotton Fibres That Will Biodegrade 6 Months After Use.

Ingredients

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Lecithin, Astragalus Sinicus Extract (Chinese Milk Vetch), Streptococcus Thermophilus Ferment, Charcoal Powder (Bamboo Charcoal), Tilia Platyphyllos Flower Extract, Magnolia Grandiflora Leaf Extract, Bakuchiol, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Citrus Sinensis (Orange) Peel Oil Expressed, Mentha Arvensis (Wild Mint) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Boswellia Carterii (Frankincense) Oil, Maltodextrin, Glycosyl Trehalose, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Succinoglycan, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Hydroxyacetophenone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Limonene*. *Natural Component Of Essential Oils

Directions

Application: Open Packet, Unfold Mask And Apply To Your Face. Leave On For 15 To 30 Minutes And Then Gently Remove. Massage Remaining Serum Into Your Skin. Don’T Forget To Recycle This Packaging!
